Oct 24, 2017

Talk about Mean-Fields in CERMICS

Talk about Mean-Fields in CERMICS

I was invited by Axel Parmentier to give a talk at CERMICS, the Applied Maths Laboratory of Ecole Nationale des Ponts et Chaussées. I really enjoyed being there for the day and giving this presentation.

We had a very good chat after the talk about Mean-Fields and Graphical Models in general.

I shared the Slides of the presentation on my GDrive.

If you liked this article and think others should read it, please share it on Twitter or Facebook .
